name: RobotFight (WIP)
description:
RobotFight is a top view 3D fighting game as you play robots trying to destroy the enemy to win a BestOf9 competition. There is no age restriction as the controls, the goals and the graphics are very simple. My inspirations are MarioKart : Double Dash, Cho'Gall's Heroes of the Strom hero and Baby-foot.

The game is played with two controllers but is meant to be played with four players : each robot is controlled by two players, one moving the robot with the half-left controller, the other aiming and attacking with the right-half controller. I'll add a mechanic to allow Pilot and Fighter to swap role in the middle of the fight soon. Menu is mouse only for the moment.

I started with a Pen&Paper prototype to test if players enjoyed playing with/against each other in this tandem-like fighting game. It went very well so I prototyped it on PC. Players enjoyed it much more thanks to real-time dynamic, the ability to deflect projectiles and so on as my playtests showed me.

I'm making this game targeting Nintendo Switch platform since each player have two to three inputs and is the most popular party game console. Feel free to comment or give advices ! :)

You may encounter some bugs as it's a WIP and I'm sorry for this, keep me informed and I'll try to fix it as soon as I can. You can use F5 to reload a Round while keeping the score as it is or Esc to return to the Main Menu.
